GarminZwiftMerge

Class GarminZwiftMerge

  • java.lang.Object
    • GarminZwiftMerge.GarminZwiftMerge

  • public class GarminZwiftMerge
extends java.lang.Object
    Standalone or API class for merging Zwift location data into a Garmin Fit file.
